public boolean validate ( String cnpj ) { tif ( cnpj = = null ) { treturn true ; } terrors . clear ( ) ; tif ( isFormatted ) { tif ( ! cnpj . matches ( CNPJ_FORMAT ) ) { terrors . add ( CNPJError . INVALID_FORMAT ) ; } tcnpj = cnpj . replaceAll ( " [^0-9] " , " " ) ; } telse if ( ! cnpj . matches ( " \\ d{ " + CNPJ_DIGITS_SIZE + " } " ) ) { terrors . add ( CNPJError . INVALID_DIGITS_PATTERN ) ; } tif ( errors . isEmpty ( ) & & hasAllRepeatedDigits ( cnpj ) ) { terrors . add ( CNPJError . ALL_REPEATED_DIGITS_FAUL ) ; } tif ( errors . isEmpty ( ) & & ! digitChecker . hasValidCheckDigits ( cnpj ) ) { terrors . add ( CNPJError . INVALID_CHECK_DIGITS ) ; } treturn errors . isEmpty ( ) ; }

INVALID_FORMAT ) ; } tcnpj = cnpj . replaceAll ( " [^0-9] " , " " ) ; } else if ( ! cnpj . matches ( " \\ d{ " + CNPJ_DIGITS_SIZE + " } " ) ) { terrors . add ( CNPJError . REPEATED_DIGITS ) ; } tif ( errors . isEmpty ( ) & & ! digitChecker . hasValidCheckDigits ( cnpj ) ) { terrors . add ( CNPJError . INVALID_CHECK_DIGITS ) ; } treturn errors . isEmpty ( ) ; }

public Integer transform ( Integer x ) { tInteger [ ] a = TABELA_DE_PESOS ; tInteger [ ] b = numeros ; tInteger result = 0 ; tint somaDosQuocientes = 0 ; tfor ( int i = 0 ; i < a . length ; i + + ) { tsomaDosQuocientes = ( a [ i ] * b [ i ] ) / 10 ; } tresult = somaDosQuocientes + x ; treturn result ; } 
public Integer transform ( Integer x ) { treturn 10 * x ; } 
public Integer transform ( Integer x ) { treturn x + ( 5 + 4 * FATOR ) ; } 
public Integer transform ( Integer x ) { treturn x % MOD ; } 
public Integer transform ( Integer x ) { treturn ( MOD ) - ( x % MOD ) ; } 
private Integer [ ] tabelaDePesos ( int code ) { tInteger [ ] pesos ; tswitch ( code ) { tcase 1 : tpesos = P1 ; tbreak ; tcase 2 : tpesos = P2 ; tbreak ; tcase 3 : tpesos = P3 ; tbreak ; tcase 4 : tpesos = P4 ; tbreak ; tcase 5 : tpesos = P5 ; tbreak ; tcase 6 : tpesos = P6 ; tbreak ; tcase 7 : tpesos = P7 ; tbreak ; tcase 8 : tpesos = P8 ; tbreak ; tcase 9 : tpesos = P9 ; tbreak ; tcase 10 : tpesos = P10 ; tbreak ; tcase 11 : tpesos = P11 ; tbreak ; tcase 12 : tpesos = P12 ; tbreak ; tcase 13 : tpesos = P13 ; tbreak ; tdefault : tthrow new IllegalArgumentException ( ) ; } treturn pesos ; } 
public boolean DVisValid ( String digitos ) { tboolean isValid = false ; tInteger dvCandidate = Integer . parseInt ( digitos . substring ( POSICAO_DO_DV - 1 , POSICAO_DO_DV ) ) ; tInteger dv = generateDV ( digitos ) ; tif ( dv . equals ( dvCandidate ) ) { tisValid = true ; } treturn isValid ; 
private Integer generateDV ( String digitos ) { tInteger [ ] intDigits = new Integer [ digitos . length ( ) ] ; tfor ( int i = 0 ; i < digitos . length ( ) ; i + + ) { tintDigits [ i ] = Integer . parseInt ( digitos . substring ( i , i + 1 ) ) ; } tInteger innerProduct = innerProduct ( TABELA_DE_PESOS , intDigits ) ; tInteger result = innerProduct ; tfor ( Rotina rotina : ROTINAS ) { tif ( rotina instanceof RequiresDigits ) { ( ( RequiresDigits ) rotina ) . setDigits ( intDigits ) ; } tresult = rotina . transform ( result ) ; } tInteger dv = result ; tif ( dv = = 10 ) { tdv = 0 ; } else if ( dv = = 11 ) { tdv = FATOR ; } treturn dv ; }

private Integer generateDV ( String digitos ) { tInteger [ ] intDigits = new Integer [ digitos . length ( ) ] ; tfor ( int i = 0 ; i < digitos . length ( ) ; i + + ) { tintDigits [ i ] = Integer . parseInt ( digitos . substring ( i , i + 1 ) ) ; } tInteger innerProduct = innerProduct ( TABELA_DE_PESOS , intDigits ) ; tInteger result = innerProduct ; tfor ( Rotina rotina : ROTINAS ) { tif ( rotina instanceof RequiresDigits ) { ( ( RequiresDigits ) rotina ) . setDigits ( intDigits ) ; } tresult = rotina . transform ( result ) ; } tInteger dv = result ; tif ( dv = = 10 ) { tdv = 0 ; } else if ( dv = = 11 ) { tdv = FATOR ; } treturn dv ; }

public boolean validate ( String cnpj ) { terrors . clear ( ) ; tif ( cnpj = = null ) { treturn true ; } tif ( isFormatted ) { tif ( ! ( CNPJ_FORMATED . matcher ( cnpj ) . matches ( ) ) ) { terrors . add ( CNPJError . INVALID_FORMAT ) ; } tcnpj = ( new CNPJFormatter ( ) ) . unformat ( cnpj ) ; } else if ( ! CNPJ_UNFORMATED . matcher ( cnpj ) . matches ( ) ) { terrors . add ( CNPJError . INVALID_DIGITS ) ; } tif ( errors . isEmpty ( ) ) { tif ( ( ! dv1Checker . DVisValid ( cnpj ) ) | | ( ! dv2Checker . DVisValid ( cnpj ) ) ) { terrors . add ( CNPJError . INVALID_CHECK_DIGITS ) ; } } treturn errors . isEmpty ( ) ; }

DVisValid ( cnpj ) ) ) { terrors . add ( CNPJError . INVALID_CHECK_DIGITS ) ; } } treturn errors . isEmpty ( ) ; }

private String checkForCorrectFormat ( String ie , List < InvalidValue > errors ) { tString unformatedIE = null ; tif ( isFormatted ) { tif ( ! ( FORMATED . matcher ( ie ) . matches ( ) ) ) { terrors . add ( IEError . INVALID_FORMAT ) ; } tunformatedIE = ie . replaceAll ( " \\ D " , " " ) ; } else { tif ( ! UNFORMATED . matcher ( ie ) . matches ( ) ) { terrors . add ( IEError . INVALID_DIGITS ) ; } tunformatedIE = ie . replaceAll ( " \\ D " , " " ) ; } treturn unformatedIE ; }

tprotected int geraDVLinhaDigitavel ( String campo ) { tint soma = 0 ; tfor ( int i = campo . length ( ) - 1 ; i > = 0 ; i - - ) { tint multiplicador = ( campo . length ( ) - i ) % 2 + 1 ; tint algarismoMultiplicado = Integer . parseInt ( String . valueOf ( campo . charAt ( i ) ) ) * multiplicador ; tsoma + = ( algarismoMultiplicado / 10 ) + ( algarismoMultiplicado % 10 ) ; } tint resto = soma % 10 ; treturn ( 10 - resto ) % 10 ; }

public String geraCodigoDeBarrasPara ( Boleto boleto ) { StringBuilder codigoDeBarras = new StringBuilder ( ) ; codigoDeBarras . append ( getNumeroFormatado ( ) ) ; codigoDeBarras . append ( String . valueOf ( boleto . getCodEspecieMoeda ( ) ) ) ; codigoDeBarras . append ( String . valueOf ( boleto . getFatorVencimento ( ) ) ) ; codigoDeBarras . append ( boleto . getValorFormatado ( ) ) ; CAMPO LIVRE codigoDeBarras.append("000000"); codigoDeBarras.append(boleto.getEmissor().getNumConvenioFormatado()); codigoDeBarras.append(boleto.getEmissor().getNossoNumeroFormatado()); codigoDeBarras.append(boleto.getEmissor().getCarteira()); codigoDeBarras.insert(4, this.dvGenerator .geraDVCodigoDeBarras(codigoDeBarras.toString())); return codigoDeBarras.toString(); } 
private StringBuilder linhaDigitavelFormater ( StringBuilder linhaDigitavel ) { linhaDigitavel . insert ( 5 , '.' ) ; linhaDigitavel . insert ( 11 , " " ) ; linhaDigitavel . insert ( 18 , '.' ) ; linhaDigitavel . insert ( 25 , " " ) ; linhaDigitavel . insert ( 32 , '.' ) ; linhaDigitavel . insert ( 39 , " " ) ; linhaDigitavel . insert ( 42 , " " ) ; return linhaDigitavel ; } 
public int geraDVCodigoDeBarras ( String codigoDeBarras ) { int soma = 0 ; for ( int i = codigoDeBarras . length ( ) - 1 , multiplicador = 2 ; i > = 0 ; i - - , multiplicador + + ) { if ( multiplicador = = 10 ) volta pro 2 multiplicador = 2; soma += Integer.parseInt(String.valueOf(codigoDeBarras.charAt(i))) * multiplicador; } soma *= 10; int resto = soma % 11; if (resto == 10 || resto == 0) return 1; 
public int geraDVLinhaDigitavel ( String campo ) { int soma = 0 ; for ( int i = campo . length ( ) - 1 ; i > = 0 ; i - - ) { int multiplicador = ( campo . length ( ) - i ) % 2 + 1 ; int algarismoMultiplicado = Integer . parseInt ( String . valueOf ( campo . charAt ( i ) ) ) * multiplicador ; soma + = ( algarismoMultiplicado / 10 ) + ( algarismoMultiplicado % 10 ) ; } int resto = soma % 10 ; return ( 10 - resto ) % 10 ; }

private String checkForCorrectFormat ( String ie , List < InvalidValue > errors ) { String unformatedIE = null ; if ( formatted ) { if ( ! ( FORMATED . matcher ( ie ) . matches ( ) ) ) { errors . add ( IEError . INVALID_FORMAT ) ; } unformatedIE = ie . replaceAll ( " \\ D " , " " ) ; } else { if ( ! UNFORMATED . matcher ( ie ) . matches ( ) ) { errors . add ( IEError . INVALID_DIGITS ) ; } unformatedIE = ie ; } return unformatedIE ; }

public String format ( String value ) { Integer integer = Integer . valueOf ( value ) ; String formated = String . format ( " %1$0 " + formatedLength + " d " , integer ) ; return formated ; }

INVALID_FORMAT ) ; } } ) ; Validator validator = new IEMatoGrossoValidator ( messageProducer , true ) ; VALID IE = 13.193.686-7 String value = "0013193686+7"; try { validator.assertValid(value); fail(); } catch (InvalidStateException e) { assertTrue(e.getInvalidMessages().size() == 1); } mockery.assertIsSatisfied(); } 
public String format ( String value ) { boolean matches = value . matches ( " \\ d{0, " + formatedLength + " } " ) ; if ( ! matches ) { throw new IllegalArgumentException ( " Argument value must have only " + formatedLength + " digits at most. " ) ; } String formated = value ; while ( formated . length ( ) < formatedLength ) { formated = " 0 " + formated ; } return formated ; }

public String format ( String value ) throws IllegalArgumentException { String result ; if ( value = = null ) { throw new IllegalArgumentException ( " Value may not be null. " ) ; } Matcher matcher = unformatted . matcher ( value ) ; result = matchAndReplace ( matcher , formattedReplacement ) ; return result ; } 
public String unformat ( String value ) throws IllegalArgumentException { String result ; if ( value = = null ) { throw new IllegalArgumentException ( " Value may not be null. " ) ; } Matcher matcher = formatted . matcher ( value ) ; result = matchAndReplace ( matcher , unformattedReplacement ) ; return result ; } 
private String matchAndReplace ( Matcher matcher , String replacement ) { String result = null ; if ( matcher . matches ( ) ) { result = matcher . replaceAll ( replacement ) ; } else { throw new IllegalArgumentException ( " Value is not properly formatted. " ) ; } return result ; }

public String unformat ( String value ) { return base . unformat ( value ) ; } 
public abstract String unformat ( String value ) throws IllegalArgumentException ; }

public int geraDVCodigoDeBarras ( String codigoDeBarras ) { int soma = 0 ; for ( int i = codigoDeBarras . length ( ) - 1 , multiplicador = 2 ; i > = 0 ; i - - , multiplicador + + ) { if ( multiplicador = = 10 ) volta pro 2 multiplicador = 2; soma += Integer.parseInt(String.valueOf(codigoDeBarras.charAt(i))) * multiplicador; } soma *= 10; int resto = soma % 11; if (resto == 10 || resto == 0) return 1; 
public int geraDVLinhaDigitavel ( String campo ) { int soma = 0 ; for ( int i = campo . length ( ) - 1 ; i > = 0 ; i - - ) { int multiplicador = ( campo . length ( ) - i ) % 2 + 1 ; int algarismoMultiplicado = Integer . parseInt ( String . valueOf ( campo . charAt ( i ) ) ) * multiplicador ; soma + = ( algarismoMultiplicado / 10 ) + ( algarismoMultiplicado % 10 ) ; } int resto = soma % 10 ; return ( 10 - resto ) % 10 ; }

PRE_VALIDATION_FORMATTER . format ( value ) ; boolean result = false ; switch ( value . charAt ( 0 ) ) { case '6' : case '7' : case '9' : result = DVX_CHECKER_MOD11 . isDVValid ( testedValue ) & & DVY_CHECKER_MOD11 . isDVValid ( testedValue ) ; break ; default : result = DVX_CHECKER_MOD10 . isDVValid ( testedValue ) & & DVY_CHECKER_MOD10 . isDVValid ( testedValue ) ; } return result ; }

public int geraDVMod11 ( String codigoDeBarras ) { int soma = 0 ; for ( int i = codigoDeBarras . length ( ) - 1 , multiplicador = 2 ; i > = 0 ; i - - , multiplicador + + ) { if ( multiplicador = = 10 ) { multiplicador = 2 ; } soma + = Integer . parseInt ( String . valueOf ( codigoDeBarras . charAt ( i ) ) ) * multiplicador ; } soma * = 10 ; int resto = soma % 11 ; if ( resto = = 10 | | resto = = 0 ) { return 1 ; 
public int geraDVMod10 ( String campo ) { int soma = 0 ; for ( int i = campo . length ( ) - 1 ; i > = 0 ; i - - ) { int multiplicador = ( campo . length ( ) - i ) % 2 + 1 ; int algarismoMultiplicado = Integer . parseInt ( String . valueOf ( campo . charAt ( i ) ) ) * multiplicador ; soma + = ( algarismoMultiplicado / 10 ) + ( algarismoMultiplicado % 10 ) ; } int resto = soma % 10 ; return ( 10 - resto ) % 10 ; }

public RedecardConfirmacaoTransacaoReturn verificaRetorno ( ) { tif ( ! " " . equals ( retorno ) ) { tString [ ] params = retorno . split ( " & " ) ; tint codigoRetorno = Integer . valueOf ( params [ 0 ] . split ( " = " ) [ 1 ] ) ; tString mensagemRetorno = params [ 1 ] . split ( " = " ) [ 1 ] ; tRedecardConfirmacaoTransacaoReturn confirmacaoTransacaoReturn = new RedecardConfirmacaoTransacaoReturn ( codigoRetorno , mensagemRetorno ) ; tif ( codigoRetorno ! = 0 ) { tthrow new ProblematicTransactionException ( " A transao no pode ser confirmada ( " + confirmacaoTransacaoReturn . getMensagemRetorno ( ) + " ) " , confirmacaoTransacaoReturn ) ; } treturn confirmacaoTransacaoReturn ; } tthrow new RedecardConfirmacaoSemDadosException ( " Os dados de retorno no foram enviados, solicite novamente " , null ) ; }

public RedecardConfirmacaoTransacaoReturn verificaRetorno ( ) { tif ( ! " " . equals ( retorno ) ) { tString [ ] params = retorno . split ( " & " ) ; tint codigoRetorno = Integer . valueOf ( params [ 0 ] . split ( " = " ) [ 1 ] ) ; tString mensagemRetorno = params [ 1 ] . split ( " = " ) [ 1 ] ; tRedecardConfirmacaoTransacaoReturn confirmacaoTransacaoReturn = new RedecardConfirmacaoTransacaoReturn ( codigoRetorno , mensagemRetorno ) ; tif ( codigoRetorno ! = 0 ) { tthrow new ProblematicTransactionException ( " A transao no pode ser confirmada ( " + confirmacaoTransacaoReturn . getMensagemRetorno ( ) + " ) " , confirmacaoTransacaoReturn ) ; } treturn confirmacaoTransacaoReturn ; } tthrow new RedecardConfirmacaoSemDadosException ( " Os dados de retorno no foram enviados, solicite novamente " , new RedecardConfirmacaoTransacaoReturn ( - 1 , " Dados no foram retornados " ) ) ; } 
public String getTid ( VISAFormaPagamento parcelamento , Calendar data , tlong numeroDeFiliacao ) { tString dataNoFormatoJuliano = obterDataNoFormatoJuliano ( data ) ; tString numeroDeFiliacaoString = String . valueOf ( numeroDeFiliacao ) ; tString numeroDeAfiliacaoDoVisaFormatado = String . valueOf ( numeroDeFiliacaoString ) . substring ( 4 , tnumeroDeFiliacaoString . length ( ) - 1 ) ; tString horaFormatadaComOMilesimoDoSegundo = String . format ( " %1$tH%1$tM%1$tS " + String . valueOf ( data . get ( Calendar . MILLISECOND ) ) . substring ( 0 , 1 ) , data ) ; tString ultimoDigitoDoAno = getUltimoDigitoDoAno ( data ) ; tString tid = numeroDeAfiliacaoDoVisaFormatado + ultimoDigitoDoAno + dataNoFormatoJuliano + horaFormatadaComOMilesimoDoSegundo + parcelamento . getCodigoDePagamento ( ) ; treturn tid ;

 private String checkForCorrectFormat ( String ie , List < InvalidValue > errors ) { String unformatedIE = null ; if ( isFormatted ) { if ( ! formatted . matcher ( ie ) . matches ( ) ) { errors . add ( IEError . INVALID_FORMAT ) ; } unformatedIE = ie . replaceAll ( " \\ D " , " " ) ; } else { if ( ! unformatted . matcher ( ie ) . matches ( ) ) { errors . add ( IEError . INVALID_DIGITS ) ; } unformatedIE = ie ; } return unformatedIE ; } 
 private boolean hasValidCheckDigits ( String value ) { String testedValue = IEConstraints . PRE_VALIDATION_FORMATTER . format ( value ) ; return validadorX . isDVValid ( testedValue ) & & validadorY . isDVValid ( testedValue ) ; } 
 public boolean isEligible ( String value ) { boolean result ; if ( isFormatted ) { result = formatted . matcher ( value ) . matches ( ) ; } else { result = unformatted . matcher ( value ) . matches ( ) ; } return result ; } 
 public void assertValid ( String ie ) { baseValidator . assertValid ( getInvalidValues ( ie ) ) ; } 
 public List < ValidationMessage > invalidMessagesFor ( String IE ) { return baseValidator . generateValidationMessages ( getInvalidValues ( IE ) ) ; } 
 private boolean hasValidCheckDigits ( String value ) { String testedValue = IEConstraints . PRE_VALIDATION_FORMATTER . format ( value ) ; for ( ValidadorDeDV validador : validadores ) { tif ( ! validador . isDVValid ( testedValue ) ) return false ; } return true ; }

private void encodeOutputField ( FacesContext context ) throws IOException { tResponseWriter writer = context . getResponseWriter ( ) ; tString message = ( String ) getAttributes ( ) . get ( " value " ) ; twriter . startElement ( " p " , this ) ; twriter . writeText ( " message : " + message , null ) ; twriter . endElement ( " p " ) ;

public int geraDigitoMod10 ( String campo ) { tint soma = 0 ; tfor ( int i = campo . length ( ) - 1 ; i > = 0 ; i - - ) { tint multiplicador = ( campo . length ( ) - i ) % 2 + 1 ; tint algarismoMultiplicado = Integer . parseInt ( String . valueOf ( campo . charAt ( i ) ) ) * multiplicador ; tsoma + = ( algarismoMultiplicado / 10 ) + ( algarismoMultiplicado % 10 ) ; } tint resto = soma % 10 ; tint resultado = ( 10 - resto ) % 10 ; treturn resultado ; }

private String calculaDigito ( String iESemDigito ) { tDigitoPara digitoPara = new DigitoPara ( iESemDigito ) ; tdigitoPara . complementarAoModulo ( ) . trocandoPorSeEncontrar ( " 0 " , 10 , 11 ) ; tchar charToCheck ; tif ( iESemDigito . length ( ) = = 6 ) { tcharToCheck = iESemDigito . charAt ( 0 ) ; } else { tcharToCheck = iESemDigito . charAt ( 1 ) ; } tswitch ( charToCheck ) { tcase '6' : tcase '7' : tcase '9' : tdigitoPara . mod ( 11 ) ; tbreak ; tdefault : tdigitoPara . mod ( 10 ) ; } tString digito2 = digitoPara . calcula ( ) ; tdigitoPara . addDigito ( digito2 ) ; tString digito1 = digitoPara . calcula ( ) ; treturn digito1 + digito2 ; }

public String calcula ( ) { tint soma = 0 ; tint multiplicadorDaVez = 0 ; tfor ( int algarismo : numero ) { tint multiplicador = multiplicadores . get ( multiplicadorDaVez ) ; tint total = algarismo * multiplicador ; tsoma + = somarIndividual ? somaDigitos ( total ) : total ; tmultiplicadorDaVez = proximoMultiplicador ( multiplicadorDaVez ) ; } tint resultado = soma % modulo ; tif ( complementar ) tresultado = modulo - resultado ; tif ( substituicoes . containsKey ( resultado ) ) { treturn substituicoes . get ( resultado ) ; } treturn String . valueOf ( resultado ) ; } 
public String format ( String value ) throws IllegalArgumentException { String result ; if ( value = = null ) { throw new IllegalArgumentException ( " Value may not be null. " ) ; } Matcher matcher = unformatted . matcher ( value ) ; result = matchAndReplace ( matcher , formattedReplacement ) ; return result ; } 
public String unformat ( String value ) throws IllegalArgumentException { String result ; if ( value = = null ) { throw new IllegalArgumentException ( " Value may not be null. " ) ; } Matcher unformattedMatcher = unformatted . matcher ( value ) ; if ( unformattedMatcher . matches ( ) ) { treturn value ; } Matcher matcher = formatted . matcher ( value ) ; result = matchAndReplace ( matcher , unformattedReplacement ) ; return result ; }

public boolean isFormatted ( String value ) { treturn base . isFormatted ( value ) ; } 
public String format ( String value ) { boolean matches = value . matches ( " \\ d{0, " + formattedLength + " } " ) ; if ( ! matches ) { throw new IllegalArgumentException ( " Argument value must have only " + formattedLength + " digits at most. " ) ; } String formated = value ; while ( formated . length ( ) < formattedLength ) { formated = " 0 " + formated ; } return formated ; } 
public String unformat ( String value ) { Integer integer = Integer . valueOf ( value ) ; String formated = integer . toString ( ) ; return formated ; } 
public boolean isFormatted ( String value ) { treturn value . matches ( " \\ d{ " + formattedLength + " } " ) ; } 
public boolean isFormatted ( String value ) { treturn base . isFormatted ( value ) ; }

public static Date pascoa ( int ano ) { tint a = ano % 19 ; tint b = ano / 100 ; tint c = ano % 100 ; tint d = b / 4 ; tint e = b % 4 ; tint f = ( b + 8 ) / 25 ; tint g = ( b - f + 1 ) / 3 ; tint h = ( 19 * a + b - d - g + 15 ) % 30 ; tint i = c / 4 ; tint k = c % 4 ; tint L = ( 32 + 2 * e + 2 * i - h - k ) % 7 ; tint m = ( a + 11 * h + 22 * L ) / 451 ; tint mes = ( h + L - 7 * m + 114 ) / 31 ; tint dia = ( ( h + L - 7 * m + 114 ) % 31 ) + 1 ; tCalendar calendar = DateUtil . hoje ( ) ; tcalendar . set ( ano , mes - 1 , dia , 0 , 0 , 0 ) ; treturn calendar . getTime ( ) ; }
